channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 65-year-old retirees in France now have higher incomes than working-age adults—meanwhile, American boomers can’t even afford to retire
item.description: While the French are enjoying higher wages in retirement than the country’s workers, nearly a fifth of American retirees are “struggling” or “living t...

item.title: Epstein was not FBI informant, Kash Patel tells lawmakers
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein did not serve as an informant for the FBI, Director Kash Patel told Congress on Tuesday, refuting reports that emerged over the summer...

item.title: Antifa Is Responsible For Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: What people often fail to understand is that for Antifa, 'anti-fascism' isn’t just a thing you are, it’s a thing you do.

item.title: Clemson Fires Employee Who Allegedly Urged Others To Be Like Charlie Kirk’s Killer

item.title: There Can Be No Peace Or Unity With A Violent, Unrepentant Left
item.description: Enough with the false, lazy rhetoric blaming 'both sides' for political violence in the wake of Charlie Kirk’s murder.

item.title: Will Ukraine Cost the GOP the Midterms?
item.description: Allowing Putin to continue his onslaught against a smaller democratic ally could be the straw that breaks Republican majorities in 2026.

item.title: Robert Redford, the Sundance Kid turned Sundance mogul, entrepreneur and independent film champion, dies at 89
item.description: He bought two acres in Provo Canyon, Utah, after falling in love with the area on a 1961 motorcycle trip. It was the start of something big.

item.title: In Defense of John Bolton
item.description: MAGA owes a lot to his vision for American foreign policy.

item.title: President Trump Deserves a Nobel Peace Prize for Operation Warp Speed
item.description: Creating and distributing a Covid vaccine in under a year was more than a medical achievement. It was a triumph of American greatness and leadership.

item.title: Fani Willis permanently removed from prosecuting Trump election interference case after losing appeal
item.description: Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis has been permanently removed from prosecuting the Trump election interference case after losing an appeal.

item.title: Spanx billionaire founder kept the brand a secret—even from family—for a year. If she hadn’t, she says she’d probably still be selling fax machines
item.description: Spanx’s billionaire founder turned $5,000 in savings from selling fax machines into a $1.2 billion shapewear empire.
